views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10 and till 12.4 (Including arm64e/A12 Devices).

ClearSafaToolbar is a Tiny Tweak that Allows to Make Clear and Neat the Background of the Toolbar in Safari Application!

The Tweak is now out from the Beta Stage of My Repository also Bringing arm64e/A12 Devices Support.

If you Have got My Repo Version, Just Uninstall it and Install this New One.

No options to Configure.

See Screenshots below.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!
